entry.title: c++调用蓝图变量
entry.content: 相信很多人遇到这样的问题，c++怎么调用蓝图的变量？最近的项目刚好用到，就写一下 12345678910111213141516171819template<class T> static const void* CallBlueprintProperty(const AActor* otherActor, const FName propertyName) { const void* outValue = nullptr; UClass* myClass = otherActor->GetClass(); for (UProperty* Property = myClass->PropertyLink; Property; Property = Property->PropertyLinkNext) { T* inProperty = Cast<T>(Property); if (inProperty && Property->GetFName() == propertyName) { outValue = &inProperty->GetPropertyValue(Property->ContainerPtrToValuePtr<void>(otherActor)); break; } } return outValue; } 例子： 1float test = *(float*)UGameUtility::CallBlueprintProperty<UFloatProperty>(AActor*, FName("test"));

entry.title: 获取文件Md5
entry.content: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728FString UGameUtility::GetFileMD5(FString filePath){ if (ExistsFile(filePath)) { FString content; FFileHelper::LoadFileToString(content, *filePath); TArray<uint8> outArray; if (FFileHelper::LoadFileToArray(outArray, *filePath)) { return GetMd5Str(outArray); } } return "";}FString UGameUtility::GetMd5Str(TArray<uint8> inArray) { FMD5 md5Maker; md5Maker.Update(inArray.GetData(), inArray.Num()); uint8 digest[16]; md5Maker.Final(digest); FString mD5Str; for (int32 i = 0; i < 16; i++) { mD5Str += FString::Printf(TEXT("%02x"), digest[i]); } mD5Str = mD5Str.ToUpper(); return mD5Str;}
